title: The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-time
author: Mark Haddon

quote_first: Amory rushed into the house and the rest followed with a limp mass that they laid on the sofa in the shoddy little front parlor. Sloane, with his shoulder punctured, was on another lounge. He was half delirious, and kept calling something about a chemistry lecture at
title: This Side of Paradise
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote_last: . To sleep 7:15. (Appear to have lost my watch without realising it, had to drive into town to buy another.)
title: The Voices of Time
author: JG Ballard
